skill_constraints: Severe bottleneck in Odoo Frontend (OWL) and Data Migration.
mitigation_strategies: Aggressive cross-training, accept potential timeline slippage.

scenario_name: Augmented Team (+1 Mid OWL Dev, +1 Data Eng) - Recommended
